sentences.english: The morning had dawned clear and cold, with a crispness that hinted at the end of summer.
sentences.chinese: 晨色清冷，帶着一絲寂寥，隱然暗示夏日將盡。

sentences.english: And younoll never be more personal one more time; Mathilda.
sentences.chinese: 你永遠不會再寂寥了，瑪蒂爾達。

sentences.english: GaoYiFei lying on the beach lonely, disappointed at the twinkling stars.
sentences.chinese: 高一飛躺在寂寥的海灘上，失望地望着閃爍的星空。

sentences.english: She wanders along the solitary lane in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 她彷徨在這寂寥的雨巷。

sentences.english: The solitude in the air, as if choked me.
sentences.chinese: 寂寥在空氣中瀰漫，彷彿要將我窒息。

sentences.english: Life is only a lonely circus , we lonely play ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 生命只是一場寂寥的馬戲，我們孤獨的表演着自己。

sentences.english: Life is a lonely circus, we wear masks to deceive oneself.
sentences.chinese: 生命是一場寂寥的馬戲，我們帶着面具欺騙自己。

sentences.english: Side by side, the two teenagers traversed the mysteries of the silent woods.
sentences.chinese: 兩位青年肩並肩地橫穿過寂寥無聲的神祕森林。

sentences.english: Twenty-eight years of womanly life and all so lonesome.
sentences.chinese: 二十八年的閨房生活卻如此寂寥。

sentences.english: Life is only a lonely circus, wu lonely play ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 生命只是一場寂寥的馬戲，我們孤獨的表演自己。

definition: to rustle in the air/to rustle/to sough/bleak/desolate/chilly
